text.section: A majority of the full authorized membership of the Board is a quorum to do business.
The Board shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

Each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation determined by the Board and in accordance with the budget of the Board; and
Reimbursement for expenses at a rate determined by the Board.

In accordance with the budget of the Board, the Board may employ:
A staff; and
Experts and consultants to obtain information and advice that relate to physical therapy.
